00036 require_once('include.php');
00037 
00043 function cw_parse_info($infolines)
00044 {
00045     preg_match('/up (.*), \d+ user.*averages: (\d[\d\.,]+)[,\s]+(\d[\d\.,]+)[,\s]+(\d[\d\.,]+)/', $infolines[0], $match);
00046     $info['uptime'] = $match[1];
00047     $info['load_1'] = $match[2];
00048     $info['load_5'] = $match[3];
00049     $info['load_15'] = $match[4];
00050     $info['date'] = $infolines[1];
00051     $info['securelevel'] = $infolines[2];
00052     $info['ip4forward'] = $infolines[3];
00053     $info['ip6forward'] = $infolines[4];
00054     $info['hostname'] = $infolines[5];
00055     $info['os'] = $infolines[6];
00056     $info['cpu'] = $infolines[7];
00057 
00058     return $info;
00059 }
00060 
00061 $Reload= TRUE;
00062 require_once($VIEW_PATH.'header.php');

00064 $View->Controller($Output, 'GetSystemInfo');
00065 $System= cw_parse_info($Output);
